description.name: Raschel bag with a drawstring 30x50cm 5kg /White
description.long_desc:
The Practical and Durable Raschel (Mesh) Bag measuring 30x50 cm is the perfect solution for storing and transporting vegetables, fruits, firewood, and other products. Made from durable material, it ensures proper ventilation, protecting the stored items from moisture and spoilage.


Product Features:



  • Color: White

  • Dimensions: 30x50 cm

  • Capacity: Up to 5 kg

  • Material: Durable raschel mesh – resistant to tears and damage.

  • Excellent Ventilation: The mesh structure allows free airflow, extending product freshness.

  • Ease of Use: Equipped with a practical drawstring for easy closing and securing of contents.


Advantages:



  • Lightweight yet highly durable material.

  • Reusable – an eco-friendly solution.

  • Protection against moisture and mold thanks to proper air circulation.

  • Versatile use in households, gardens, or storage facilities.

description.name: Woven polypropylene bag 50x80cm 30kg /White
description.long_desc:
The Durable Polypropylene Bag measuring 50x80 cm with a load capacity of up to 30 kg is a versatile and practical solution for storing and transporting various materials. Made from high-quality polypropylene, it offers excellent resistance to mechanical damage, moisture, and weather conditions. It is perfect for use in households, agriculture, construction, and logistics.


Product Features:



  • Material: Durable and damage-resistant white polypropylene.

  • Dimensions: 50x80 cm.

  • Load Capacity: Up to 30 kg – ideal for storing and transporting bulk materials such as grains, sand, coal, or waste.

  • Weather Resistance: Protects contents from moisture and dirt.

  • Reusable: Its solid construction allows for multiple uses, making it an eco-friendly and cost-effective solution.


Advantages:



  • High durability and tear resistance.

  • Versatile applications in the home, garden, agriculture, and construction.

  • Safe storage and transport of even heavy materials.

  • Resistance to moisture and weather conditions.


Applications:



  • Storage and transport of bulk materials (grain, sand, coal, pellets).

  • Disposal of construction and garden waste.

  • Use in agriculture, warehouses, and transportation.

The Durable Polypropylene Bag measuring 65x105 cm with a load capacity of up to 50 kg is a versatile and practical solution for storing and transporting various materials. Made from high-quality polypropylene, it offers excellent resistance to mechanical damage, moisture, and weather conditions. It is ideal for use in households, agriculture, construction, and logistics.


Product Features:



  • Material: Durable and damage-resistant blue-red polypropylene.

  • Dimensions: 65x105 cm.

  • Load Capacity: Up to 50 kg – perfect for storing and transporting bulk materials such as grains, sand, coal, or waste.

  • Weather Resistance: Protects contents from moisture and dirt.

  • Reusable: Solid construction allows for multiple uses, making it an eco-friendly and cost-effective solution.


Advantages:



  • High durability and tear resistance.

  • Versatile applications in the home, garden, agriculture, and construction.

  • Safe storage and transport of even heavy materials.

  • Resistance to moisture and weather conditions.


Applications:



  • Storage and transport of bulk materials (grain, sand, coal, pellets).

  • Disposal of construction and garden waste.

  • Use in agriculture, warehouses, and transportation.

description.name: Szczotka do rdzy druciana żółta 3 rzędy do szczelin drewno (12/120)
description.long_desc:
Specjalistyczne narzędzie do dokładnego czyszczenia szczelin – szczotka do usuwania rdzy 3-rzędowa marki Geko została zaprojektowana z myślą o pracy w trudno dostępnych miejscach. Dzięki wyjątkowemu układowi drutów ułożonych pod kątem w kształcie daszka, narzędzie doskonale radzi sobie z czyszczeniem wąskich szczelin, narożników i spoin.

  • 3 rzędy drutu stalowego mosiądzowanego – skuteczne usuwanie rdzy i zabrudzeń przy zachowaniu delikatności dla czyszczonej powierzchni.
  • Druty ułożone pod kątem w kształcie daszka – zwiększona precyzja czyszczenia w trudno dostępnych miejscach, takich jak szczeliny, narożniki czy spoiny.
  • Solidna drewniana rączka – ergonomiczny uchwyt zapewniający wygodę i stabilność pracy.
  • Kompaktowe wymiary (28 cm x 3 cm) – idealne do precyzyjnych zadań w ciasnych przestrzeniach.
  • Powierzchnia robocza 13,5 x 2 cm – zoptymalizowana do efektywnego czyszczenia szczelin i detali.

Specyfikacja techniczna:

  • Producent: Geko
  • Materiał drutu: stalowy mosiądzowany
  • Materiał rączki: drewno
  • Ilość rzędów drutu: 3
  • Długość całkowita: 28 cm
  • Szerokość całkowita: 3 cm
  • Wymiary przestrzeni roboczej: 13,5 x 2 cm
  • Układ drutów: pod kątem w kształcie daszka, trójkąta

description.name: 4-row wire brush rust removal (wooden handle)
description.long_desc:
A specialized tool for tasks requiring precision and durability – the Geko rust removal brush is an indispensable solution for working with metal, wood, and other materials that need effective cleaning from contaminants.


Key Features:



  • Four rows of brass-coated steel wire – enhanced cleaning performance thanks to the optimal amount of bristles. The brass coating increases corrosion resistance, extending the tool's lifespan.

  • Comfortable wooden handle – made from natural material, it ensures a comfortable grip even during prolonged use. Its ergonomic design reduces hand fatigue.

  • Durable construction – the robust build guarantees effective removal of rust and other tough residues from various surfaces.

  • Precise working area (14 x 2 cm) – perfect for cleaning hard-to-reach spots like corners and edges.


Technical Specifications:



  • Brand: Geko

  • Wire material: Brass-coated steel

  • Handle material: Wood

  • Number of wire rows: 4

  • Total length: 28 cm

  • Total width: 3 cm

  • Working area dimensions: 14 x 2 cm


Whether you're preparing metal for painting or cleaning stubborn rust off tools, the Geko rust removal brush is built to deliver reliable, long-lasting performance.

description.name: 26pcs synchronous carburetor tester with 4 manometers set
description.long_desc:
The carburetor synchronization kit is an indispensable tool for mechanics and motorcycle or classic car enthusiasts equipped with multi-carburetor fuel systems. With four precise pressure gauges, flexible hoses, and a set of 17 adapters of different diameters and lengths, it allows for the accurate balancing of vacuum pressure in individual carburetors. This ensures optimal engine performance, even combustion, and improved throttle response.


Key Features and Benefits



  • Accurate carburetor synchronization – Enables precise adjustment of vacuum pressure in multi-carburetor engines.

  • Four large pressure gauges (93 mm) – Provide clear and precise readings.

  • Flexible rubber hoses (5x8 mm, 900 mm length) – Allow easy connection to the intake system.

  • Complete set of adapters (17 pieces) – Ensures compatibility with various motorcycle and vehicle models.

  • Easy to use – Suitable for both professional workshops and individual users.


Set Includes:



  • 4 x precise pressure gauges (93 mm diameter)

  • 4 x flexible rubber hoses (5x8 mm, 900 mm length)

  • 17 adapters of different diameters and lengths – Allowing connection to various vehicle models.


This carburetor synchronization kit is the perfect tool for ensuring smooth and stable engine operation in motorcycles, classic cars, and other carbureted vehicles.

description.name: 28pcs radiator pressure and cooling system tester set
description.long_desc:
Professional Cooling System Tester – Reliable Leak Diagnosis and Pressure Testing for Passenger Cars


The professional cooling system tester is a reliable tool for diagnosing leaks and checking pressure in the cooling system of passenger vehicles. With its easy operation and universal adapters, this device is compatible with many popular vehicle makes and models, allowing for quick detection of issues without the need for a workshop visit.


Functionality and Benefits



  • Easy to use – The intuitive system allows for quick cooling system checks without requiring specialized knowledge.

  • Wide compatibility – The set includes multiple adapters, making the tester suitable for most European, American, and Asian vehicles.

  • Precise diagnostics – Enables the detection of leaks, checking the tightness of the radiator, hoses, and cooling system caps.

  • Built-in thermometer – Allows monitoring of coolant temperature during testing.

  • High-quality construction – Durable materials and precise components ensure a long lifespan for the tool.


Set Includes



  • Pressure pump with hose – Enables fast and accurate pressure testing.

  • Thermometer – Provides accurate measurement of coolant temperature.

  • Refilling device – Facilitates easy coolant replenishment.

  • Transparent hose – Allows for easy flow monitoring.

  • Set of adapters – Compatible with multiple vehicle models.


Vehicle Compatibility


The cooling system tester is suitable for a wide range of vehicles, including brands such as:


Mercedes-Benz (W123, W126, W124, W201, W140, W210, W211, W215, W216, W220, R230, A-Class W168, Vito, M-Class)
BMW (E32, E34, E36, E38, E39, E46, E60, E63, E64, E65, E90, 345)
Audi (A4, A5, A6, models 1975-1993)
Volkswagen (Passat 1996-2002, Golf, Beetle, Sharan, T4, Vento)
Ford (Mondeo, Focus, C-Max, International, USA)
Opel (various models)
Toyota (Celica, RAV4, Previa, MR2)
Peugeot, Citroën, Fiat, Renault, Alfa Romeo
Honda, Hyundai, Infiniti, Nissan, Mazda, Subaru, Suzuki, Mitsubishi, Lexus, Isuzu, Kia
Jaguar, Jeep, Land Rover, Saab, Buick, Cadillac, GMC, Lincoln, Oldsmobile, Saturn, Hummer
Mini Cooper, Ssangyong, Vauxhall, Sterling


Additionally, the set includes R123 / R124 and R123 / R125 radiator cap adapters, increasing the device's versatility.

description.name: Motorcycle compression & fuel pressure tester
description.long_desc:
Advanced Diagnostic Tool for Professional Workshops


This pressure tester kit is designed for precise measurements in motorcycle fuel and oil systems. It enables quick and accurate diagnosis of issues related to compression, oil pressure, or fuel pressure, making it an indispensable tool for mechanical service centers.


Manufacturer: Geko



  • Gauge Material: Durable steel and damage-resistant glass for long-term reliability.

  • Accuracy: ±2% of the full scale (depending on the gauge).

  • Applications: Fuel system diagnostics, cylinder compression measurements, and oil pressure checks.


Kit Contents:



  1. Gauge 0–7 bar (0–100 psi): Perfect for measuring fuel pressure in standard systems.

  2. Gauge 0–20 kPa (0–300 psi): Designed for cylinder compression testing, helping to assess engine condition.

  3. Gauge 0–1 bar (0–100 kPa): Excellent for measuring low fuel pressure in specialized applications.

  4. Pressure hoses, reducers, and connectors: Ensure easy attachment to various types of motorcycle engines.


Applications:



  • Engine Diagnostics: Detecting issues related to insufficient compression, such as worn piston rings or leaking valves.

  • Fuel System Testing: Measuring injector pressure and testing fuel pumps.

  • Maintenance and Servicing: Monitoring oil system parameters to ensure optimal engine performance.

description.name: Turbo pressure gauge 1-3 Bar
description.long_desc:
Reliable Tool for Turbocharger System Diagnostics


This tester is designed to enable quick and precise measurement of pressure generated by turbochargers. It is an essential tool for mechanics and service centers specializing in diagnostics and repair of vehicles equipped with turbocharged systems. With a measurement range of 1 to 3 bars, the tester is ideal for diagnosing turbochargers used in most passenger cars and light commercial vehicles.


Manufacturer: Geko
Measurement Range: 1–3 bar, perfect for evaluating turbocharger performance in standard automotive applications.
Precision: An accurate gauge ensures fast and clear readings.
Robust Construction: The housing is made of durable materials resistant to vibrations and tough workshop conditions.
Ease of Use: An intuitive design and simple connection system allow for quick setup and operation.


Included in the Set:



  • Pressure gauge

  • Flexible hose

  • 2 connectors


Applications:



  • Turbocharger Diagnostics: Evaluate boost pressure to identify potential issues such as performance drops, system leaks, or turbocharger damage.

  • Intake System Testing: Check for leaks in intake pipes and assess intercooler efficiency.

  • Service and Maintenance: Perform regular boost pressure measurements to ensure optimal engine performance.


This Turbocharger Pressure Tester 1–3 bar is an indispensable tool for any professional workshop or mechanic specializing in diagnosing and repairing turbocharged systems. It enables precise fault detection and helps maintain vehicles at peak efficiency.

description.name: 5pcs ball joint separator set
description.long_desc:
The set enables quick and precise work related to the removal of ball joints, pins, and wiper arms.

Handling ball joints in automotive suspensions.
Removing wiper arms and pins in mechanical systems.
Working with various fasteners in demanding workshop conditions.
Technical Specifications:
Manufacturer: Geko
Work Range: Suitable for pins with a diameter of up to 17 mm.
Expanding screw thickness: 15.8 mm and 14 mm – ensures strong, stable expansion.
Threaded section thickness: 16 mm – durability and reliability for everyday use.
Precise craftsmanship: Ergonomic shapes facilitate installation and removal without damaging components.
Versatility: The set is suitable for a wide range of applications, both in workshops and for home projects.
Set Includes:
5 different pullers designed for working with ball joints and pins of various sizes.

description.name: 21pcs ball joint service tool set
description.long_desc:
Universal Professional Puller for Pins and Bushings


A precision tool designed for professionals, enabling quick and easy replacement of control arm bushings without the need to dismantle the entire assembly. This makes work more efficient, saving time and resources.



  • Versatility: Suitable for a wide range of bushings and pins, offering extensive usability.

  • Durability: Constructed from high-quality materials, resistant to heavy-duty use.


Easy Maintenance: Before use, ensure the control arm socket is clean and free from corrosion. Removing rust and debris guarantees precise fitting.


Set Contents:



  • 1 x Screw Press: Screw with a diameter of 28 mm, operated with a 22 mm wrench.

  • 2 x Bushing Mounting Discs: Provide stable and secure positioning of bushings during operation.

  • Bushings: 16 bushings of various dimensions, suitable for a wide range of applications:

    • Inner Diameter: From 23.0 mm to 69.0 mm.

    • Outer Diameter: From 37.0 mm to 76.0 mm.

    • Height: From 20.0 mm to 94.0 mm.



  • 1 x Pin: Diameter 16 mm, length 65 mm.

  • 1 x Solid Case: Functional and durable, ensuring protection against mechanical damage.


This Universal Professional Puller is an essential tool for mechanics and professionals seeking reliability, precision, and efficiency in suspension repair tasks.

description.name: 12pcs of mixed color tire chalk 12x120mm
description.long_desc:
Waterproof chalk is a reliable tool for marking tires and other rubber surfaces, suitable for both professional workshops and home repairs. The set includes 12 pieces of chalk in 6 different colors (yellow, black, white, blue, red, green), allowing for easy and clear marking tailored to the user's specific needs.


Each chalk stick measures 120x12 mm, providing a comfortable grip and ease of use. The product is fully waterproof, ensuring that markings remain durable even in challenging weather conditions, such as rain or humidity. The markings are resistant to washing, so they stay visible for an extended period.


Product Features:




  • Set of 12 Chalks: 6 different colors (yellow, black, white, blue, red, green) for easy organization and identification of markings.




  • Waterproof: The chalks are water-resistant, making markings durable and readable even in damp conditions.




  • Chalk Dimensions: 120x12 mm




  • Durability: Markings made with this chalk are clear, durable, and resistant to washing, ensuring long-lasting visibility.




Applications:




  • Tire Marking: The chalk is perfect for marking tires in automotive workshops, tire services, and during seasonal tire changes.




  • Rubber Surface Marking: It can be used for marking other rubber surfaces, such as drive belts or sealing components.




  • Industrial Applications: Ideal for marking parts during production processes or quality control.

  • Set of 12 Chalks: 6 different colors (yellow, black, white, blue, red, green) for easy organization and identification of markings.




  • Waterproof: The chalks are water-resistant, making markings durable and readable even in damp conditions.

  • Durability: Markings made with this chalk are clear, durable, and resistant to washing, ensuring long-lasting visibility.




Applications:




  • Tire Marking: The chalk is perfect for marking tires in automotive workshops, tire services, and during seasonal tire changes.




  • Rubber Surface Marking: It can be used for marking other rubber surfaces, such as drive belts or sealing components.




  • Industrial Applications: Ideal for marking parts during production processes or quality control.

description.name: Impact screwdriver bit PH1 25mm S2
description.long_desc:
Impact Bit PH1 25mm S2 – Precision and Durability in One


The Tvardy PH1 25mm S2 is a high-quality impact bit designed for professionals and DIY enthusiasts who value durability and precision. Made from robust S2 steel, this tool offers exceptional wear resistance and long-lasting performance.


With its precisely crafted PH1 profile, the Tvardy bit ensures perfect compatibility with Phillips screws, preventing damage and reducing the risk of slipping. Its outstanding resistance to impact loads makes it an ideal choice for both everyday tasks and demanding assembly work.


Key Features:



  • S2 Steel – Exceptional hardness and wear resistance for extended bit lifespan.

  • 25mm Length – Compact size for precision work in tight spaces.

  • Magnetic Tip – Securely holds screws, making assembly easier and more comfortable.

  • Reinforced Construction – Designed for use with impact drivers.

  • Set of 2 Pieces – A practical solution for any workshop.

Impact Bit PZ1 25mm S2 – Reliability and Precision


Tvardy PZ1 25mm S2 is a high-quality impact bit designed for professionals and DIY enthusiasts who demand durability and precision in their work. Made from robust S2 steel, it provides excellent wear resistance and maximum efficiency.


The PZ1 25mm S2 bit is specifically designed for Pozidriv screws, ensuring greater precision and eliminating the risk of tool slippage. Its resistance to impact loads makes it an excellent choice for both home and professional applications.
